name: Revenge of the Redcoats
description:
You are one of four neighborhood friends fighting against the invasion of pasty guys in red sweaters. 

Controls:

WASD keys to move

Left Click to shoot

Move mouse to aim

Press Enter to start game

(Dev note: The player character "Timmy" does not work at the moment. Feel free to try the other characters though, as they work fine...for some reason.
